subject: Trades (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos’ owner, Pat Bowlen, has sent a letter to season-ticket holders explaining why the organization had to trade the Pro Bowl quarterback Jay Cutler to the Chicago Bears. Bowlen stressed team unity in the e-mail message, reiterating that he and the new coach, Josh McDaniels, had reached out many times to Cutler, who did not respond to their overtures to repair the strained relationship. “It has never been about one player, and it never will be,” wrote Bowlen, who remained largely silent during the six-week rift that ended with Thursday’s trade.
